packagegui.name: suricatasync
packagegui.title: Suricata: XMLRPC Sync

field.description:
All changes will be synced with apply config to the IPs listed below if this option is checked.

Important: While using "Sync to hosts defined below", only sync from host A to B, A to C but do not enable XMLRPC sync to A. This will result in a loop!

option.name: Sync to configured system backup server
Do not sync this package configuration

field.description: Timeout in seconds for the XMLRPC timeout. Default: 150

Ask target hosts to refresh rule sets files on each sync operation.

During each Suricata package sync operation, ask the target remote host to check for a new set of posted rule sets files and refresh the local copies if necessary. The default is to refresh the files if newer versions have been posted.

Note: The sync process will wait for the rules download and rebuild to finish on the target remote host before returning.

option.name: Signal target host to refresh rules files
Do NOT ask target host to refresh rules files
